# polytomic_uservoice_connection (Resource)

UserVoice Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "polytomic_uservoice_connection" "uservoice" {
  name = "example"
  configuration = {
    api_key = "my-api-key"
    domain  = "example.com"
  }
}
```

- `organization` (String) Organization ID

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) UserVoice Connection identifier
